education.description: In my third year of pursuing a B.Sc degree in Computer Science and Engineering at my university life, I have developed a deep understanding of various computer science topics, including programming, algorithms, data structures, database management, and web development.
During my time at college, I experienced a challenging and stimulating academic environment that fostered the expansion of my knowledge and the development of critical thinking skills.

At my school life, I pursued studies in the science group, benefiting from a comprehensive education that equipped me with the necessary skills and knowledge for my academic and professional endeavors ahead.

experience.description: Started Web Project 'MediCareHub' as a Front-End + Backend developer, I have been actively involved in collaborating with designs, developing, and clients since 2021 to create seamless and intuitive user experiences for our innovative smart solutions in the medical as well as health care of people of Bangladesh.

In this year, i have found this company which is a Ecommerce company, selling Technological products through online. Also it offers home delivery and Assure customer to have a best quality products. A fully trusted online marketplace.

I have been working with IEEE since 2021. I worked actively . On this Year I have been selected as Organizing Secratary and also have a chance to work with so many professionals and experienced persons and professors.
